thread.title: BRIEF-Francesca's Holdings Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.10

title: BRIEF-Francesca's Holdings Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.10
text: March 27, 2018 / 11:53 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Francesca's Holdings Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.10 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 27 (Reuters) - Francesca’s Holdings Corp: * FRANCESCA’S REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES FISCAL YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.10 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 SALES $138.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $137.8 MILLION * Q4 SAME STORE SALES FELL 15 PERCENT * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.19 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.10 INCLUDING ITEMS * ‍CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR FISCAL YEAR 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $30 MILLION​ * SEES Q1 2018 LOSS PER SHARE $0.10 TO $0.13 * EXPECTS TO OPEN APPROXIMATELY 35 BOUTIQUES AND CLOSE ABOUT 20 BOUTIQUES IN FISCAL YEAR 2018 * SEES DILUTED EPS IN RANGE OF $0.53 TO $0.63 FOR FISCAL YEAR ENDING FEBRUARY 2, 2019 * ‍Q4 ADJUSTED DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE WERE $0.20​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
